name: immemorial
content:
from/since time immemorial literary
Add to word list
Add to word list
for a very long time: Her family had farmed that land since time immemorial.
See more
formal existing or traditional for an extremely long time: She said it was the immemorial custom of the villagers to have a feast after the harvesting.
